Logging into your account is the first s: O le sitepu muamua o le log-in i lau Galuega Fa'apoloketi ma fausia loa lau Poloketi fou Fa'aSeaSketch.

SeaSketch puts powerful tools into the h: O le SeaSketch, o se  meafaigaluega sa na o i latou e iai le agava'a tau GIS ma tomai faapitoa e ona latou fa'aaogaina.  Aepeita'i o le a fa'asoa atu e le SeaSketch le malosiaga fa'ameafaigaluega i lima o i latou e nafa ma Fuafuaga, e o loo fa'aaogaina aemaise o tagata lautele e fa'atalanoa ai Fuafuaga mo Ogasami Fa'asao Fa'apitoa e feso'otai ma faiga fa'asaienisi ma fa'amatalaga talafeagai.  Ua tele atunuu, nu'u ma fa'alapotopotoga i le lalolagi ua latou fa'aaogaina lenei meafaigaluega e fausia ai fa'aiuga lelei i aso uma.
SeaSketch Supports Collaborative Plannin: Lagolagoina e le SeaSketch Fuafuaga Fa'utasi mo la tatou Sami
Tap again to measure a path, or use the: Toe tap e fua ai se ala, pe fa'aoga ki lalo e fa'auma pe toe amata.
Tap le faafanua e amata fua ai.
You are accessing SeaSketch from the bet: O lo'o e mauaina le SeaSketch mai le vaega o le beta next.seasket.ch. Mo le poto sili ona lelei, fa'amolemole fa'aoga <2>www.seasketch.org</2>. Afai o lo'o e fa'aogaina ni fa'ailoga e le tuusao <5>faitau nei fa'atonuga</5>.
